data.fullContent: The Millennium Bridge is a footbridge across the River Thames in London. It is a steel suspension bridge which links Bankside with the City. Its position is between Southwark Bridge ( downstream ) and Blackfriars Railway Bridge ( upstream ). The bridge opened on 10 June 2000. It is the newest bridge across the Thames.
data.answer: 千禧桥是一座横跨伦敦泰晤士河的人行桥。它是一座连接河岸和城市的钢吊桥。它的位置在南沃克桥(下游)和黑修士铁路桥(上游)之间。这座桥于2000年6月10日开放。它是最新的横跨泰晤士河的桥。
